codeData.codeContent:
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	var i1 uint8 = 80
    j1 := i1 + 200
    assert(j1 == 24)
    fmt.Println(j1)

    var i2 uint8 = 0b0011
    var i3 uint8 = 0b0101
    assert(i2 & i3 == 0b0001)
    assert(i2 | i3 == 0b0111)
    assert(^i3 == 0b11111010)

    var i4 = 0b00110101
    assert(i4 << 2 == 0b11010100)
    assert(i4 >> 2 == 0b00001101)
    assert(i4 << 100 == 0)

    var ir1 uint8 = 2
    var ir2 uint16 = 2
    var ir3 uint16 = 2
    assert(i4 << ir1 == 0b11010100)
    assert(i4 >> ir1 == 0b00001101)
    assert(i4 << ir2 == 0b11010100)
    assert(i4 >> ir2 == 0b00001101)
    assert(i4 << ir3 == 0b11010100)
    assert(i4 >> ir3 == 0b00001101)

    assert(i4 << -ir1 == 0)
    assert(-ir1 == 254)

    //todo

}
